import React from "react"; const Attractions=(props)=>{ console.log('Sites',props.attractions) const filtered=props.sites.filter((place)=>{ return place.photo&&place.name&&place.subtype[0]&&place.location_id }) const display=filtered.map((place)=>{ const button=props.attractions['attractions'][place.name]? : return(

{place.name}

{Math.floor(parseFloat(place.rating)*10)/10}

{place.address_obj.street1+', '+place.address_obj.city}

Category:{place.subcategory[0].name}

{button}
) }) console.log('display',display) return( {display} ) } export default Attractions
